text: Tomodachi Life is a Nintendo 3DS game released in 2013 by Nintendo. The game is a sequel to the Japan-only game Tomodachi Collection. The game starts by naming your island and making a Mii that is your "lookalike". Players then can create more Miis to inhabit their island. ==Gameplay== The game first starts the player on an empty island. On the island, you are to give the island a name. Afterwards, you must give your island a look-alike Mii that looks like you. Then you will feed them, and give them another Mii to live with. After this is complete, the player is allowed to make up to 100 Miis to unlock other parts of the island such as an interior or clothing store. The game does not end, and you can play for as long as you want. title: Tomodachi Life
